title: How to Make Sims Younger on Sims 3

steps.title: Press Ctrl+⇧ Shift+C (in other words, open up cheat box) and type testingcheatsenabled true.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + C (in other words, open up cheat box) and type testingcheatsenabled true.

steps.title: Go to the Sim that you want to be younger and shift click it.
steps.content: Go to the Sim that you want to be younger and shift click it.

steps.title: When you shift click it you should see multiple options that you haven't seen before, click on edit Sim in create a Sim.
steps.content: When you shift click it you should see multiple options that you haven't seen before, click on edit Sim in create a Sim.

steps.title: Just go to basics when you're in create a Sim and change the age, once you press on the check mark, your Sim should go on the certain age that you set.
steps.content: Just go to basics when you're in create a Sim and change the age, once you press on the check mark, your Sim should go on the certain age that you set.
